name: Necrotic Tick
movement: climb and walk at 10 feet speed
description: The Necrotic Tick is a tiny, unaligned beast that poses a unique threat due to its ability to drain life and manipulate its host, using necrotic energy to seal wounds with scabrous tissue.
memorable: Its ability to transform hosts into zombies through necrotic regeneration makes it a substantial tactical challenge.
goals: To drain life from hosts and create new minions.
relations: Often encountered with other undead or necromantic creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark and damp environments where its hosts might reside.
strengths: Possesses necrotic regeneration that allows it to heal its host while draining their life.
weaknesses: Vulnerable due to its low hit points and armor class; can be easily attacked if detected.
attacks: Blood Drain attack inflicts piercing damage and attaches to the target, causing persistent blood loss.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Regeneration heals its host at the cost of necrotic damage, potentially transforming them into a zombie.
additional_information: Can incite rage in hosts to attack other creatures.
The host must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw to resist its influence.
Detachment from a host deals necrotic damage to the previous host.
Can create zombies if necrotic hp matches the host's maximum hit points.
test_queries: manipulative beast found in dark places
